Class UserDao

Returns:

findUserInfo

public UserInfo findUserInfo(UserId userId)
Finds user info by user id.

insert

@Transactional
public void insert(User user,
                                 com.ajah.util.crypto.Password password)
This method is for saving a new user. It includes the password field since that field is the only field on the user table that is not mapped to a User property.

Parameters:
user - The user to save, required.
password - The password for the user, required.

findUserByUsername

public User findUserByUsername(java.lang.String username)
Find a user by username.

Parameters:
username - Value to match against the user.username column, required.
Returns:
User if found, otherwise null.

findUser

public User findUser(UserId userId)
Find a user by unique ID.

Parameters:
userId - Value to match against the user.user_id column, required.
Returns:
User if found, otherwise null.
